title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi | Dismantling All Order
description:
Exploring the symbolism in Star Wars in general while seeing how The Last Jedi perpetuates some aspects of the basic symbolic world while dismantling any positive vision of order. 

Support this channel:
patreon: https://www.patreon.com/pageauvideos
paypal: https://www.paypal.me/JonathanPageau

website: http://www.pageaucarvings.com
facebook: https://www.facebook.com/jonathanpageau
twitter: https://twitter.com/pageaujonathan

Original Video on the Symbolic Confusion in Star Wars:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TCgDOg2anbA
